See also: gunstig

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From the noun Gunst +‎ -ig.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈɡʏnstɪç/

Adjective[edit]

günstig (comparative günstiger, superlative am günstigsten)

  1. favorable
  2. convenient
  3. good value, cheap

Synonyms[edit]

  • (cheap): billig, preiswert

Antonyms[edit]

  • ungünstig
